services.name: Counselling & Psychotherapy
services.description: Many people come for Psychotherapy and Counselling when they are experiencing difficulties in their lives, loss, bereavement, illness, life crisis, a transition, work or relationship problems, a sense of unhappiness or dissatisfaction, depression, anxiety or simply a desire to know themselves more deeply. Psychotherapy and Counselling is a process which seeks to help you gain a sense of wholeness, well-being, resilience & self-awareness.
services.booking_note: Each therapist manages their own practice. To enquire about Psychotherapy, please contact the therapist directly. All therapists working at The Rooms are accredited by UK recognised regulatory boards and councils to ensure standards and protection.

services.name: Hypnotherapy
services.description: Hypnotherapy is a state of keen awareness. The subject is wide-awake and aware of everything around them. It's more like a focused dream in which your logical mind is switched off for a while, allowing your subconscious to make real and lasting changes to the way you live. Clinical Hypnotherapy is a form of Psychotherapy that is used to create subconscious change in a person in the form of new responses, thoughts, attitudes, behaviours and feelings.
services.booking_note: Each Hypnotherapist manages their own practice. To enquire about a service, please contact the therapist directly.

services.name: Podiatry
services.description: A Podiatrist is a state registered professional in a branch of medicine devoted to the diagnosis, medical and surgical treatment of the disorders of the foot and ankle and lower extremity.
conditions_treated: Foot, Knee or Ankle Pain & Injury
services_offered: Taping and strapping of Acute Trauma
services.booking_note: Please contact the practitioner directly to book a podiatry appointment.

services.name: Alexander Technique
services.description: The Alexander Technique is a practical method for improving posture, movement, and overall body awareness. It teaches individuals how to reduce unnecessary tension and move more efficiently, promoting better balance, coordination, and ease in daily activities. Developed by Frederick Matthias Alexander in the late 19th century, the Alexander Technique is a holistic approach to re-educating the body and mind.
benefits: Improved Posture - Helps reduce slouching and tension, leading to a more upright and natural posture
Pain Relief - Can alleviate chronic pain, particularly in the neck, back, and joints
Enhanced Performance - Musicians, actors, dancers, and athletes use the technique to improve coordination, breathing, and endurance
Reduced Stress and Tension - Encourages relaxation and mindfulness in movement
Increased Mobility - Enhances flexibility and ease of movement
ideal_for: Office workers dealing with poor posture and back pain
Performers seeking improved stage presence and endurance
Athletes looking to enhance coordination and prevent injuries
People recovering from injuries or managing chronic pain
Anyone interested in improving their overall movement and well-being
services.booking_note: Book a session with a certified practitioner to discover how this method can transform the way you move and feel.

services.name: Reflexology
services.description: Reflexology is based on the theory that certain reflex points on the feet correspond with various organs and structures of the body. By applying pressure to the feet using thumb, finger or hand to specific reflex points, the Reflexologist can detect subtle changes in the body and by stimulating these points may bring about balance and well-being.
services.booking_note: Contact the practitioners directly to book a reflexology appointment.
